price: 16. ce Jour où ils apparaîtront à découvert et (où) rien d’eux ne sera caché à Allah. À qui appartient, aujourd’hui, la royauté ? À Allah, l’Un, le Haut Dominateur.
arabic: يَوۡمَ هُم بَٰرِزُونَۖ لَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مِنۡهُمۡ شَيۡءٞۚ لِّمَنِ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡوَٰحِدِ ٱلۡقَهَّارِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yawma hum bārizūna lā yakhfā ʿalā al-lahi min'hum shayon limani al-mul'ku al-yawma lillahi al-wāḥidi al-qahāri
